content.text: Welcome to your first Dutch lesson! You're in a cozy coffee shop ('koffietentje') in Utrecht. The goal is to order your first coffee. Let's start with how to greet the barista.

data.tip: The Dutch 'g' is a 'throaty' sound, made at the back of your throat. It's similar to the 'ch' in the Scottish word 'loch'.

content.title: Greeting the Barista
content.setting: You've reached the front of the line in a relaxed coffee shop. The barista smiles at you, ready to take your order.

conversation_flow.title: Say that you would like something.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Goedemorgen! Wat mag het zijn voor jou?

content.text: Great start! Now it's time to order the specific drink. A 'koffie verkeerd' is the Dutch version of a café au lait. It literally means 'wrong coffee' because it has more milk than coffee.

data.tip: The stress is on the second syllable: 'ver-KEERD'. The 'ee' sounds like the 'a' in 'dare'.

content.title: Placing Your Order
content.setting: The barista has greeted you and is waiting for your order.

conversation_flow.title: Order one 'koffie verkeerd'.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, en wat wil je bestellen?

conversation_flow.title: Say you want to drink it 'here'.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Prima, een koffie verkeerd. Is dat om hier op te drinken of om mee te nemen?

content.text: Excellent! You've ordered your coffee. Now for the final step: payment. In the Netherlands, 'pinnen' is the extremely common verb for paying with a debit card.

data.pinnen: to pay with a debit card

data.meaning: I would like to pay by card.

content.text: Notice how the barista uses 'alsjeblieft' when giving you the coffee. It means 'please', but also 'here you are'. Context is key!

content.title: Paying for Your Coffee
content.setting: The barista finishes making your coffee and places it on the counter for you.

conversation_flow.title: Ask how much it costs.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Komt voor elkaar. Zo, alsjeblieft, je koffie verkeerd.

conversation_flow.title: Say you would like to pay by card.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Dat is drie euro vijftig (€3,50), alsjeblieft.

conversation_flow.title: Say 'thank you' and 'goodbye'.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Natuurlijk. De betaling is gelukt. Geniet ervan!
conversation_flow.final_message: Graag gedaan! Fijne dag nog, doei!
